review:
On time consultation. Visited for stroke treatment for my father. Doctor asked for the problem and listened to my father. He then checked the reports and explained the problem and risk associated with it. No unwanted tests recommended. Suggested for further diagnosis which were related to the issue.
I would recommend the doctor without any doubt.

We had recently admitted our cousin  who has been having fever and behaving abnormally under care of Dr Srikanth .Doctor took detailed history and with the clue that he came back from Uttar Pradesh recently sent some blood tests and to our surprise it came positive. He told that patient had scrub typhus and gave appropriate medications.  We got discharged in 7 days . He is now healthy and doing good all thanks to Dr Srikanth.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for your kind words

review:
Took my mother for fits management ,she was having fits every month for past 10 years on 2 drugs but still uncontrolled. Doctor took detailed history and  adjusted drugs with which she is better now.
Later came to know that he is from world famous NIMHANS . Fortunate have found him.

Visited doctor for my aunt who was complaint seeing double persons . Dr examined her and immediately told his diagnosis and asked for test called RNS . And the test came positive and one blood test was asked which also was positive. He confirmed it as ocular Myasthenia and gave   Treatment and with it her vision improved.

I highly recommend the doctor for his skills and patience and accuracy.

visited for my grand mother ...she had severe right side headache .Dr Srkanth was meticulous in examination and diagnosed it as occipital neuralgia, advised few medications ,my grand ma became completely normal in 2 days - without any big tests he cured her. thanks you doctor and I recommend him to everyone
Mr. Srikanth is  very  patient and spends  enough time with   the  patient to understand the issue.
We had a Video consultation for my wife spondylitis with severe headache and vomitings****** **** ********* ******** ********* *** perfect prescription.... We strongly recommend...
reply_text: Thanks a lot for the review Pawan garu…

review:
Very much caring doctor, attended all my complaints very patiently, solved my problem. 
Nice doctor to visit at Hyderabad.
reply_text: Thanks a lot Dixit garu for your feedback
